title: How to Make Peach Juice

steps.headline: Slice the peaches in half.
steps.description: Cut or scoop out the peach flesh.

steps.headline: Drop the peach flesh into a blender.
steps.description: Add the water, lime juice, sugar and ice cubes.

steps.headline: Pour into a pitcher or jug for storage.
steps.description: Alternatively, pour direct into glasses for immediate serving. Add some ice cubes, and a garnish of a peach slice and mint leaf.

tyn: Spoon for scooping (optional if not using knife to remove skin)
text: Slice the peaches in half. Cut or scoop out the peach flesh. Drop the peach flesh into a blender. Add the water, lime juice, sugar and ice cubes. Blend to liquefy the ingredients.  Pour into a pitcher or jug for storage. Alternatively, pour direct into glasses for immediate serving. Add some ice cubes, and a garnish of a peach slice and mint leaf. Finished.
sentences: Cut or scoop out the peach flesh.
Drop the peach flesh into a blender.
Add the water, lime juice, sugar and ice cubes.
Pour into a pitcher or jug for storage.
Alternatively, pour direct into glasses for immediate serving.
Add some ice cubes, and a garnish of a peach slice and mint leaf.
